participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Creative and adventurous, always seeking new experiences and connections.
participant_1.background: I'm 5'10", but I feel like I'm taller than that because of my hair. I am pursuing my law degree. I’m always looking for wildlife when I’m outside. I make friends fast and say goodbye fast. I'm afraid of forgetting the memories of my travels.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and artistic, enjoys creating and cherishing moments with loved ones.
participant_2.background: I haven't seen my family in years, but I'd love to buy a mobile for their nursery. I play electric violin and also work as an accountant. I love to create, whether it's for work or for my own enjoyment. Yellow is my favorite color. One of my favorite things is to spend time with the people I love.

content.text: Yellow is my favorite color!  What about you?
I love blues and greens.  I like the way they look together.
I like blues and greens too!  I like to wear them together.
Me too!  I'm always looking for new ways to style them.
Me too!  I love to mix and match them.
Do you have any favorite brands?
I love Anthropologie and Free People.  They have great clothes for my style.
I love those stores too!  I always find something I like there.
Me too!  I love their clothes and their home decor.
Me too!  I could spend all day shopping there.
Me too!  It's my favorite place to go.
I'm glad we have similar taste!
Me too!  It's so much fun to shop with someone who gets your style.
Agreed!  We should go shopping together sometime.
I would love that!  Let's do it soon!
Sounds good!  I'm free this weekend.
Me too!  Let's make a plan
